parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Retrives list of given unit targets matching specified filter. If the filter is not specified, all targets are returned.</value></part><part><name/>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  unit '''targets''' [enemyOnly, maxDistance, sides, maxAge, alternateCenter] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit which target knowledge is retrieved</value></part><part><name>Parameter1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [enemyOnly, maxDistance, sides, maxAge, alternateCenter]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>Parameter2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> enemyOnly (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to include only enemy targets, [[false]] to include all targets </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> maxDistance (Optional): [[Number]] - max. distance based on target's expected position ''(distance is measured in 2D)''; use 0 to ignore the maxDistance filter </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sides (Optional): [[Array]] - array of accepted sides; use [] to ignore the side filter </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> maxAge (Optional): [[Number]] - max. target age, targets that are known to unit for longer then maxAge are ignored; use 0 to ignore the maxAge filter </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> alternateCenter (Optional): [[Array]] - alternate (2D or 3D) position used for distance check ''(distance is measured in 2D)''; if not specified unit position is being used </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER7</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - unit's targets matching the criteria </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_targets = _unit [[targets]] [false, 300, <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[east,sideEnemy]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>]; //all targets of east or renegade side in 300m</code> </value></part><part><name>Example1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_targets = _unit [[targets]] [true, 300]; //enemy targets in 300m</code> </value></part><part><name>Example2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_targets = _unit [[targets]] []; //all targets</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[nearTargets]], [[targetsQuery]], [[reveal]], [[side]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>

</dl>
